description.en: Place four ping pong balls on your challenge field.
Get your robot to scoop the balls up with the cup then empty the content into your robot.

Your robot has to stay within the challenge field.
Your robot shouldn't spill the balls out.

You stepped out of the field and spilled two or more balls = Good job! Are you ready for another round?
You spilled <2 balls and haven't stepped out of the field = Wow! Excellent job! Do you think you can do it again with no cups kicked this time?
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points.
You stepped out of the field and spilled two or more balls = 5 points
You spilled <2 balls and haven't stepped out of the field = 10 points
You haven't spilled any of the balls out and managed to stay within the field = 15 points
